abstract:
In this paper we use the simple logistic mathematical model to represent the development of COVID-19 epidemic in Sãao Paulo city under quarantine regime and we estimate the total amount of time it is necessary to decrease the number of seriously ill in order to reduce the demand for ICU hospital beds to tolerable levels. Clearly the same reasoning used here can be used for any other city in similar conditions.
Competing Interest Statement
The authors have declared no competing interest.
author: MARCELO DOMINGOS MARCHESIN
title: TAMING COVID-19 EPIDEMIC IN SÃO PAULO WITH A LOGISTIC MODEL AND NON-PHARMACEUTICAL MEASURES

funding.funding-statement: Funding Statement no external funding was received
